messages.content:
U: I am working on a planning checklist. Please keep it focused on keeping it small.
A: Okay. I will center the response on the priority you named.
U: Not sure if this is the same. This could be the same thread or not; please give me the next action that helps me move forward.

Understood. A practical reset is to name what matters most, keep the rest secondary, and move with one small step. I will keep this tight and decision-ready. Should this prioritize consistency or a clean break?
